description:
Merged Zamasu’s ashes rises a universe encompassing darkness. Out of energy and out of options, Goku needs some help, and fast!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arata na Kibou!! o Mune ni: Saraba Trunks
Mit neuer Hoffnung im Herzen: Lebe Wohl, Trunks!
With New Hope!! in Our Hearts: Farewell, Trunks
新たなHOPE[きぼう]!!を胸に さらばトランクス
